subtitleNullable: Reddit Comments Dataset on Democrat-related Posts. Updated daily
descriptionNullable:
This dataset provides valuable insights into public opinions and discussions related to Democrats on the popular social media platform Reddit. 

The dataset is **updated on a daily basis**, ensuring that the dataset always reflects the most recent discussions and opinions. 

> If you find this dataset valuable, consider hitting the upvote button! 😊💝

## Interesting Task Ideas:

1. Analyze sentiment towards Democrats on Reddit over time.
2. Identify the most controversial posts and comments related to Democrats.
3. Study user engagement patterns, such as upvotes and downvotes, on Democrat-related posts.
4. Analyze the demographics and activity of users who participate in these discussions.
5. Develop a model to predict the popularity of Democrat-related posts based on various factors.
6. Explore the relationship between the post score and the sentiment of comments.
7. Investigate the impact of popular events or news on public opinion towards Democrats.
8. Analyze the types of awards and accolades given to Democrat-related posts.

## Related Datasets

1. [Public Opinion on Republicans](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/public-opinion-on-republicans-daily-updated)
2. [US Cost of Living](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/us-cost-of-living-dataset-3171-counties)
3. [Wages by Education US](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/asaniczka/wages-by-education-in-the-usa-1973-2022)
